REASON: dizziness, tiredness, weight gain. Tremors, trembling fingers and hands.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR VERELAN: This med at 180 mg brought my blood pressure down somewhat, but was not completely successful.  The tremors/trembling (a rare side-effect) made me discontinue it.
amazing medicine for hypertension.  Combined with lisinopril, brought my BP down to 125/80 from a high of 210/160 in one week.
